meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bob DiGiusto Mike Lease Anita Israel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2783.

td.p: Bob DiGiusto, a postal clerk from Roseville, Minnesota
Mike Lease, a computer programmer from Chelmsford, Massachusetts
Anita Israel, a museum technician originally from Newburgh, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,199)

tr.td: AWARDS
THE BIBLE
GAME SHOWS
MUSEUMS
FAMILIAR PHRASES
PRESIDENTIAL NICKNAMES

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
